statements: SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT response_id, response, respondent_id FROM survey_responses;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 123;
SELECT question_id, response FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 456 ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT survey_id FROM survey_responses;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, question_id, response FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 123 ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(response) AS total_responses FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 5 GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT respondent_id, COUNT(response) AS total_responses FROM survey_responses GROUP BY respondent_id HAVING COUNT(response) > 3;
SELECT survey_id, MAX(response_timestamp) AS latest_response_timestamp FROM survey_responses GROUP BY survey_id ORDER BY latest_response_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT question, category FROM survey_questions WHERE id = 2;
SELECT respondent_id, response_date, response FROM survey_responses WHERE question_id = 3 ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 10 ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT question, created_at FROM survey_questions WHERE category = 'Tech' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 1;
SELECT response, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE question_id = 2 ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) FROM survey_questions GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT question, response FROM survey_questions JOIN survey_responses ON survey_questions.id = survey_responses.question_id;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses JOIN survey_questions ON survey_responses.question_id = survey_questions.id ORDER BY survey_responses.response_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT survey_id, response_text, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM surveys WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT question_id, survey_id, question_text FROM survey_questions ORDER BY question_id DESC;

SELECT survey_responses.response_id, survey_questions.question_text, survey_responses.response_text FROM survey_responses JOIN survey_questions ON survey_responses.question_id = survey_questions.question_id WHERE survey_responses.response_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 1
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM surveys WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM survey_questions WHERE survey_id = 2 ORDER BY question_id DESC
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT survey_name, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM surveys JOIN survey_responses ON surveys.survey_id = survey_responses.survey_id GROUP BY survey_name HAVING total_responses > 10
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT id, response_text, response_date FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_id = 1;
SELECT survey_name, survey_description, end_date FROM Surveys WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, email, age FROM Respondents WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT survey_id, question_id, answer FROM SurveyResults WHERE response_id = 100 ORDER BY survey_id ASC, question_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Respondents WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM Respondents WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM Surveys WHERE end_date > NOW();
SELECT response_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT Surveys.survey_name, SurveyResults.answer FROM Surveys INNER JOIN SurveyResults ON Surveys.id = SurveyResults.survey_id;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT respondent_id, survey_id, response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 1 AND survey_id = 3;
SELECT SUM(age) as total_age, AVG(age) as avg_age FROM respondents;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM survey_questions WHERE survey_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 1;
SELECT respondent_id, survey_id, response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM survey_questions WHERE question_type = 'Multiple Choice';
SELECT id, title, start_date FROM surveys WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT respondent_id, COUNT(*) AS responses_count FROM survey_responses GROUP BY respondent_id;
